creditline: Gift of the Charles Bolles Rogers Family: Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Nancy Rogers Pierson, Mary Rogers Savage
description: candlestick, wick trimmer and snuffer Note: The Candlestick 59.11.20"a" has a removable top piece. On 3/28/2017, this removable top piece was numbered 59.11.20"d", and labeled as ""candlestick sconce/removable nozzle".
dimension:
